docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Feb. 17 -The Veterans Administration, using public funds, tested for its own purposes several brands of hearing aids. Consumers Union asked for the results and was refused. It has appealed to the V.A.'s chief medical director, possibly as a preliminary move to court action.

headline.main: New Freedom of Information Law: Fact-Seekers Testing Its Effectiveness

docs.abstract: article on suits (at least 12) brought under '67 freedom of information law; examples cited
